optionsShowDeviceNames.message: Show Device Names (will ask for microphone access)

optionsHelpListHeader.message: Please set <mark>media.setsinkid.enabled</mark> option to true in the Firefox Configuration, to do that:

optionsHelpListStep1.message: Open 'about:config': type <mark>'about:config'</mark> in the address field. And press 'Enter'

optionsHelpListStep2.message: Click <mark>'I accept the risk!'</mark> button to proceed.

optionsHelpListStep3.message: Type or copy 'media.setsinkid.enabled' to the search field at the top.

optionsHelpListStep4.message: Double click <mark>'media.setsinkid.enabled'</mark> to change its value to 'true'. Alternatively right-click and select the Toggle command.

optionsHelpListStep5.message: Value of the 'media.setsinkid.enabled' parameter should be displayed as true

optionsHelpLinkToDoc.message: Link to more detailed document on how to access Configuration Editor is here.
